title: PreSeason Garbage
body:
Your fucking preseason is the worst i've even seen. I feel like you guys don't even know what the fuck you guys are doing. Shouldn't the preseason be used to do some different shit ie removing crit ( which should be removed you fucktards) not whatever the fuck you guys are doing making your op minions, your broke ass champs, removing my best summoner spells, etc ( by etc i mean more dumb fucking shit that you guys think is good). To sum up, go to fucking hell with all your gay changes.


Sincerely, 
 Fuck you

replies.body: Enough salt here to saturate the Dead Sea thrice over.

I looked at his boards history:

"I agree with that lucky bitch, He is pretty good. I would know since i main zilean so fuck you, you wiskas look cat feeding figerino."

Probably more like four times over.

I dare not look.

But this post could cure all salt related deficiency problems just by reading the first sentence.
6: Learn to not say fuck in every sentence dumbass
More toxic than {{champion:17}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:29}} combined.
You were alluding to Greg Street and his gang, I hope.
You forgot {{champion:6}}
Urgot is in this game?
Yeah he's got this weird ability called Noxian Corrosive Charge. He shoots this canister of acid that deals damage, apparently...
Not enough to be viable though.
Never Furgot
OK.
You do know it's called implement then balance, right?
This is very well articulated and I agree 100%

See, this douche canoe gets it. This douche canoe feeds cats, and he gets it. What does that say about the rest of you life life pieces of poop? You all need to take tips from this wiskas lookin' guy.
You guys are one off topic bunch of figs.
yeah after 4 years and finally learning how to play this pre season is looking the most bleak, s4 was pre good same w season 3

> [{quoted}](name=james121234,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Muq8GvU8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-26T00:58:44.509+0000)
>
> yeah after 4 years and finally learning how to play this pre season is looking the most bleak, s4 was pre good same w season 3

You think s4 pre season was good? are you fucking drunk? did u not see warwick? were u in a coma during pre season 4? this fooking guy.
I dont play in low elo so it wasnt really a problem I would always just dump on them or counter with jax not a big deal at all.
Ah yes, devourer Warick. That was fun. I enjoyed being 100-0'd by his ult and maybe two Qs.
I wish there was a way to monitor attendance on LoL, that way we can have our dose of schadenfreude when the mass of LoL players starts to drop off.
